title: Land rights views: Number 8, July 1997
creator_credit: Northern Land Council Media Unit and Northern Land Council
brief_description: A yearly magazine program dealing with issues associated with the Northern Land Council. This edition includes reports on the Jawoyn ‘Five Year Plan’, the Crocker Island seas native title claim, the Wik decision, a social impact study in the Kakadu region, the fight to save Railway Dam in Darwin and the ‘Black economy’ in the Top End. Music from various Aboriginal acts is also featured.
